Package com.skillstorm.daos

Class MySQLItemDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.skillstorm.daos.MySQLItemDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ItemDAO
public class MySQLItemDAOImpl extends Object implements ItemDAO
This is the MySQLDAOImpl class, which implements the various methods from the interface ItemDAO to create methods which query the database.
Author:
Todd Foreman
